settings.content:
These honest people wanted to make sure their voices were heard above the conglomerates that control the conversation today...

Unfortunately, we don’t have the same millions of dollars budgets as them to support massive marketing campaigns...

So please, all I ask you is to continue further because it may be your last chance to discover…

Developed by herbal experts including PhDs, chemists, and nutrition doctors, Curalin is backed by a published double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled study, proving its effectiveness.

The clinically tested formula made of 9 natural ingredients relies on rigorous research to offer the most effective and natural solutions possible, aiming to create health that lasts. Curalin is where science meets nature for a healthier life.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.faq_data:
When should I take Curalin?:For the best results, we recommend taking 2 Curalin, 3 times a day, after each meal.|

Can I take Curalin alongside my medications?:Curalin is intended as a supportive measure in maintaining healthy blood sugar levels, rather than a standalone medication, cure, or replacement for existing treatments. It is always recommended to consult with a medical professional before including any dietary supplement into your diet.|

Where is Curalin made?:Curalin uses ingredients grown and powdered in India. Capsuling and bottling is done by 3rd party labs in the USA and EU.|

Are these supplements certified?:Curalin is a dietary supplement, not a medication, and as such, FDA certification doesn't apply, as the FDA only approves medications. However, we want to emphasize that our formula has undergone clinical testing, and its effectiveness has been clinically proven.Plus, all of our supplements are made in NSF and GMP certified, and FDA registered facilities.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.content:
Curalife Guarantee: Curalife strives to keep you totally fulfilled and gratified, which is why we offer a first order money back guarantee. If at any point you decide this is not the product for you, remember you are protected by the highest standard first order money-back guarantee. 

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

All items can be returned to:

LOGYSTICO C/O CURALIFE
RETURNS DEPT
140 DELAWANNA AVE
CLIFTON, NJ 07014

You can also call us:
888.286.7307 and we will help you arrange your return. Our hours of operation are 9am - 5pm PST Monday - Friday. 

Please return your item with your original order number attached and we will refund you within 2 weeks of receiving. 

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.
